name: One Hit Kill Tactics
description:
NOTE: cursor movement can be slightly buggy and not flush with the grid, press E to end turn, and move cursor to the corner of the map to reposition cursor onto grid

Tactics game where one attack will kill the enemy. (definitely not because I didn't have time to actually add HP and damage to the game)

Arrow Keys/WASD to move cursor, navigate menus

Press E on player turn to end turn without moving all units

Credits (thanks!):

Main art pack: https://mattwalkden.itch.io/fantasy-battle-pack

Font: GBA FE Dialogue by dcapit8ed (https://fontstruct.com/fontstructions/show/1396587)

Menu panel: https://opengameart.org/content/menu-panels
